frontmatter.chapterTitle: Interpreting the Edge Stack Meshery Design
frontmatter.description: This chapter explores the relationships between different components in the Ambassador Edge Stack (AES) system using a Kanvas design. It covers the roles and communication ports of each component, as well as the service account roles and relationships within the AES system.
